sentences.en: a successful medical/dental/law practice.
sentences.cn: 成功的诊所 / 牙医诊所 / 律师事务所

sentences.en: All members of the association adhere to a strict code of practice.
sentences.cn: 协会的所有成员都遵守一套严格的行为规范。

sentences.en: Aspiring musicians need hours of practice every day.
sentences.cn: 想当音乐家就要每天练许多小时。

sentences.en: dangerous working practices
sentences.cn: 危险的工作方法

sentences.en: During the Second World War the area was used for gunnery practice.
sentences.cn: 二战期间，该地区被用来操练火炮射击。

sentences.en: He has moved seamlessly from theory to practice.
sentences.cn: 他已经顺利地实现了从理论到实践的过渡。

sentences.en: he was out of practice at interrogation.
sentences.cn: 他对审讯不太熟练。

sentences.en: I eventually realized I had to change my attitude toward medical practice.
sentences.cn: 我终于认识到自己不得不改变对医务工作的看法。

sentences.en: In practice a graduate tax is an administrative nightmare.
sentences.cn: 毕业税具体操作起来不啻一场行政噩梦。

sentences.en: In practice, workers do not work to satisfy their needs.
sentences.cn: 事实上，工人工作并不是为了满足本身的需要。

sentences.en: In recent years, doctors have been trained specifically for general practice.
sentences.cn: 近些年来，已有医生接受专门培训从事全科诊疗。

sentences.en: in theory this method is ideal—in practice it is unrealistic.
sentences.cn: 理论上这种方法很理想，——但实际上却不现实。

sentences.en: It is normal practice not to reveal details of a patient's condition.
sentences.cn: 不透露患者病情的细节是惯常的做法。

sentences.en: It takes hours of practice to learn to play the guitar.
sentences.cn: 学习弹吉他需要长时间的练习。

sentences.en: Needless to say, theory and practice sometimes diverged.
sentences.cn: 不用说，理论和实践有时候并不相符。

sentences.en: religious beliefs and practices
sentences.cn: 宗教信仰和习俗

sentences.en: Schools will work together to share best practice.
sentences.cn: 各学校将协同分享最佳方案。

sentences.en: The new doctor's practice was miles away from where I lived.
sentences.cn: 新开的诊所离我住的地方有几英里远。

sentences.en: the theory and practice of teaching
sentences.cn: 教学的理论与实践

sentences.en: There developed a practice that came to a tragic and terrible end.
sentences.cn: 逐渐形成了一种做法，其结局却很悲惨。

sentences.en: This practice embarrassed Luther, but he let it pass without comment.
sentences.cn: 这种做法让卢瑟难堪，但是他未置一词。

sentences.en: This practice is frowned upon as being wasteful.
sentences.cn: 这种行为被认为是浪费而不获认可。

sentences.en: We have choir practice on Tuesday evening.
sentences.cn: 星期二晚上我们要练习合唱。

sentences.en: With a little more practice you should be able to pass your test.
sentences.cn: 稍微再练一练，你应该能通过考试了。

words.tran_cn: 可用的；行得通的；可实行的
熟练的；有经验的；老练的（等于practised）
实用性，实际性；实际，实例
实践；练习；惯做（practise的过去分词）
练习，实践；实施，实行；从事

phrases.tran_cn: 最佳实务，最佳实践；最佳做法，最优方法；典范做法
实际上（用来指与预期或据信已发生的事相反的实际情况）
教学实习（师范院校学生的）；试教

trans.tran_cn: 常规，实践，习俗，训练，工作，诊所,事务所
trans.tran_en: when you do a particular thing, often regularly, in order to improve your skill at it
when you do a particular thing, often regularly, in order to improve your skill at it
